title: Lesson 5 - Add an input parameter to the component
contents:
mode_edit

第 5 課 - 向元件新增輸入引數link

Lesson 5 - Add an input parameter to the componentlink

本課程示範瞭如何建立元件的 @Input()，透過它將資料傳給元件以便自訂元件。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to create a component @Input(), use it to pass data to a component for customization.

所需時間： 完成這節課預計需要 10 分鐘左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 10 minutes to complete this lesson.

開始之前link

Before you startlink

這節課以上一課的程式碼為起點，因此你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在整合開發環境（IDE）中使用你在第 4 課中建立的程式碼。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 4 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 從上一課的程式碼範例開始。選擇，以便：

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 4 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的線上例子，其中 StackBlitz 的介面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下載範例並在你的 IDE 中開啟它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你還沒看過簡介，請存取 Angular 課程簡介以確保你已具備完成這節課所需的一切知識。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在這節課中遇到任何問題，可以檢視這節課的完整程式碼，參見。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之後link

After you finishlink

  • 應用程式有了一個可以用作資料型別的新介面。

    Your app has a new interface that it can use as a data type.

  • 應用程式有了一個帶有範例資料的新介面例項。

    Your app has an instance of the new interface with sample data.

輸入屬性的概念性預覽link

Conceptual preview of Inputslink

輸入屬性允許元件共享資料。資料共享的方向是從父元件到子元件。

Inputs allow components to share data. The direction of the data sharing is from parent component to child component.

要從父元件接收資料，子元件必須使用 @Input() 裝飾器標記出類屬性。這個裝飾器可以用在元件和指令中。

To receive data from a parent component, a child component must mark a class property with the @Input() decorator. This decorator can be used in components and directives.

更深入的解釋，請參閱子指令與父指令和元件之間共享資料指南。

For a more in depth explanation, please refer to the Sharing data between child and parent directives and components guide.

在這節課中，你將在 HousingLocationComponent 元件中定義 @Input() 屬性，這能讓你自訂要在元件中顯示的資料。

In this lesson, you'll define @Input() properties in the HousingLocationComponent component which will enable you to customize the data displayed in the component.

課程步驟link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中對應用程式程式碼執行下列步驟。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 匯入 Input 裝飾器link

Step 1 - Import the Input decoratorlink

此步驟將 Input 裝飾器匯入到類中。

This step imports the Input decorator into the class.

在程式碼編輯器中：

In the code editor:

  1. 導航到 src/app/housing-location/housing-location.component.ts

    Navigate to src/app/housing-location/housing-location.component.ts

  2. 更新檔案的匯入程式碼以包含 Input 和 HousingLocation：

    Update the file imports to include Input and HousingLocation:

    import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { HousingLocation } from '../housinglocation';

第 2 步 - 新增輸入屬性link

Step 2 - Add the Input propertylink

  1. 在同一個檔案中，名為 housingLocation 的 HousingLocation 型屬性新增到 HousingLocationComponent 類別。在屬性名之後新增一個 ! 並在它前面加上 @Input() 裝飾器：

    In the same file, add a property called housingLocation of type HousingLocation to the HousingLocationComponent class. Add an ! after the property name and prefix it with the @Input() decorator:

    export class HousingLocationComponent { @Input() housingLocation!: HousingLocation; }

    你必須加上 !，是因為這個輸入屬性期望有傳入值。在這種情況下，沒有合適的預設值。在這個範例應用程式中，我們就知道必須傳入該值 —— 設計意圖就是如此。感嘆號稱為非空斷言運算子，它告訴 TypeScript 編譯器此屬性的值不能是 null 或 undefined。

    You have to add the ! because the input is expecting the value to be passed. In this case, there is no default value. In our example application case we know that the value will be passed in - this is by design. The exclamation point is called the non-null assertion operator and it tells the TypeScript compiler that the value of this property won't be null or undefined.

  2. 儲存你的更改並確認應用程式沒有任何錯誤。

    Save your changes and confirm the app does not have any errors.

  3. 在繼續下一步之前更正所有錯誤。

    Correct any errors before you continue to the next step.

課程回顧link

Lesson reviewlink

在這節課中，你建立了一個用 @Input() 裝飾器裝飾的新屬性。還使用了非空斷言運算子來通知編譯器新屬性的值不能是 null 或 undefined。

In this lesson, you created a new property decorated with the @Input() decorator. You also used the non-null assertion operator to notify the compiler that the value of the new property won't be null or undefined.

如果你在學習這節課時遇到任何問題，可以在中檢視完整的程式碼。

If you are having any trouble with this lesson, you can review the completed code for it in the .
